_sText:
**EDIT: Navigation file included! Now you can play with bots**

This is the very first map I made, but it was never done. Now, when I have made it done, I'd like to share it with you :-) Of course there will be some bugs, so just write a comment. 

- Upcoming Version.
1. optimization.

- Whats new?
1. A 3D Skybox.
2. Models at the small farms. (Cows, Chickens, Pigs)
3. Some better details.
4. New and better pictures

- Don't know how to install? Follow these steps:
Download the map by pressing the Download button
Go to: YourSteamDir\Steam\SteamApps\common\Counter-Strike Source\cstrike\maps and then just put the .bsp file in there.
If you want this map for a server, I would suggest to Bzip it. The download will be much faster, when the file is Bzipped. When you put the .bsp.bz2 file on your server, remember the .bsp file too, else it won't work. The Bzipper can be downloaded here: http://css.gamebanana.com/tools/1495

Enjoy the map, please rate and leave a comment.
